name: The Frustrating Game (samuraiking)
description:
Do you think video games are too much fun? Do you dislike things being fair, understandable, and downright enjoyable? Then I have the game for you! Come play The Frustrating Game, where the rules are broken and it's only technically winnable! 

The Frustrating Game boasts such bold features as: 

controls that change frequently

an ice level cranked to 11

a maze that's very annoying (seen here):

and other cruel, sadistic features I won't ruin the surprise of. Give it your best shot, and see if you can make it to the ever-coveted win screen! 

*I am not responsible for any controllers, windows, computers, parental relationships or anything else you might break during the course of playing this game, nor am I responsible for the emotional stress you will most likely put yourself through in attempting to beat it

*only available for windows desktop

made in Godot
